title: The One With the East German Laundry Detergent

questions.question: What does Ross say is 'amazing' about a guy's ability?
options: Being able to remove a bra with one maneuver
questions.correct_answer: Being able to remove a bra with one maneuver
questions.explanation: Ross says 'It's amazing. Ok, you just reach in there, there's one little maneuver, and bam, a bra right out the sleeve.'

questions.question: What does Joey say women can see anytime they want?
questions.explanation: Joey says 'You just look down and there they are. How you get any work done is beyond me.'

questions.question: What is the reason Ross gives for not doing his laundry in his own building?
options: The laundry room is always busy
The laundry room is too small
The laundry room is too expensive
questions.explanation: Ross says 'there's a.... rat problem. Apparently they're attracted to the dryer sheets, and they're goin' in fine, but they're comin' out all.... fluffy.'

questions.question: What is the name of the laundry detergent Ross uses?
questions.explanation: Ross says 'Uberveiss. It's new, it's German, it's extra-tough.'

questions.question: What happens to Rachel's clothes after she does her laundry?
questions.explanation: Ross says 'now, everything's kinda pink' after Rachel leaves a red sock in with her white clothes.

questions.question: Who does Joey ask to pretend to be his girlfriend?
questions.explanation: Joey asks Monica to pretend to be his girlfriend to make Angela jealous.

questions.question: What does Chandler compare himself to when talking to Janice about their relationship?
questions.explanation: Chandler says 'I'm like the bing, bing, bing. You're like the boom, boom, boom.'

questions.question: What is the reason Rachel gives for feeling like she can't live on her own?
questions.explanation: Rachel says 'I'm gonna look like a big marshmallow peep. What am I doing? What am I doing? My father's right. I can't live on my own! I can't even do laundry!'

questions.question: What does Phoebe compare breaking up with someone to?
questions.explanation: Phoebe says 'It's like pulling off a Band-aid. Just do it really fast, and then the wound is exposed.'

questions.question: What does Ross do after Rachel kisses him?
options: He turns and bangs his head on an open dryer door
questions.correct_answer: He turns and bangs his head on an open dryer door
questions.explanation: Ross turns and bangs his head on an open dryer door after Rachel kisses him.

questions.question: What is the name of the woman who keeps causing trouble for Rachel at the laundromat?
questions.explanation: The woman's name is not mentioned in the transcript.

questions.question: What does Monica say about Bob?
questions.explanation: Monica says 'Bob is great. He's smart, he's sophisticated, and he has an emotional age beyond, like eight.'

questions.question: What does Joey say about Angela's eating habits?
options: She makes a cute nibbly noise when she eats
questions.correct_answer: She makes a cute nibbly noise when she eats
questions.explanation: Joey says 'You know what I miss the most about her? That cute nibbly noise when she eats. Like a happy little squirrel, or a weasel.'

questions.question: What does Chandler give as a reason for breaking up with Janice?
questions.explanation: Chandler says 'Here's the thing, Janice. You know, I mean, it's like we're different.'

questions.question: What does Phoebe do to help Chandler break up with Janice?
options: She talks to Janice for him
She breaks up with Janice for him
questions.correct_answer: She talks to Janice for him
questions.explanation: Phoebe talks to Janice for Chandler and helps him break up with her.

questions.question: What is the outcome of Rachel and Ross's laundry adventure?
options: All of Rachel's clothes are clean and intact
All of Rachel's clothes are lost
All of Rachel's clothes are pink
All of Rachel's clothes are stolen
questions.correct_answer: All of Rachel's clothes are pink
questions.explanation: Ross says 'now, everything's kinda pink' after Rachel leaves a red sock in with her white clothes.

questions.question: What does Monica say about Bob's emotional age?
options: He's emotionally older than his age
He has an emotional age beyond, like eight
questions.correct_answer: He has an emotional age beyond, like eight
questions.explanation: Monica says 'Bob is great. He's smart, he's sophisticated, and he has an emotional age beyond, like eight.'

questions.question: What does Joey say about his plan to win Angela back?
options: He's going to be honest with her
He's going to pretend to be someone else
He's going to make her jealous
questions.correct_answer: He's going to make her jealous
questions.explanation: Joey says 'I'm thinking, if we put our heads together, between the two of us, we can break them up.'

questions.question: What does Chandler do after he breaks up with Janice?
options: He runs out of Central Perk
questions.explanation: Chandler is shown with multiple empty espresso cups in front of him after he breaks up with Janice.
